channel.title: Financial-Inclusion on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in Financial-Inclusion on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: CashBux
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: A joint venture between UBX and AllBank that empowers MSMEs to act as ‘mobile ATMs’ offering cash withdrawals, bill payments, and card acceptance in underbanked communities.

item.title: Assured
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Insurtech platform that aggregates protection products from top carriers like Chubb, PGA Sompo, and Etiqa, allowing any digital channel to embed insurance coverage via a single API.
